verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G5105><s%> seeing we also <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G2192><s%> compassed about <S%G4029><s%> <S%G2254><s%> with so great <S%G5118><s%> a cloud <S%G3509><s%> of witnesses <S%G3144><s%>, let <S%G659><s%> us <S%G2249><s%> lay aside <S%G659><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> weight <S%G3591><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the sin <S%G266><s%> which doth so easily beset <S%G2139><s%> us, and let us run <S%G5143><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> the race <S%G73><s%> that is set before <S%G4295><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>,

Looking <S%G872><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the author <S%G747><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> finisher <S%G5051><s%> of our faith <S%G4102><s%>; who <S%G3739><s%> for <S%G473><s%> the joy <S%G5479><s%> that was set before <S%G4295><s%> him <S%G846><s%> endured <S%G5278><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%>, despising <S%G2706><s%> the shame <S%G152><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> is set down <S%G2523><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> consider <S%G357><s%> him that endured <S%G5278><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> contradiction <S%G485><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G846><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> ye be wearied <S%G2577><s%> and faint <S%G1590><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> minds <S%G5590><s%>.
Ye have <S%G478><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> resisted <S%G478><s%> unto <S%G3360><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, striving <S%G464><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> ye have forgotten <S%G1585><s%> the exhortation <S%G3874><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> speaketh <S%G1256><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto children <S%G5207><s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>, despise <S%G3643><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G3643><s%> the chastening <S%G3809><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, nor <S%G3366><s%> faint <S%G1590><s%> when thou art rebuked <S%G1651><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> he chasteneth <S%G3811><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> scourgeth <S%G3146><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he receiveth <S%G3858><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> ye endure <S%G5278><s%> chastening <S%G3809><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> dealeth <S%G4374><s%> with you <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> with sons <S%G5207><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> is he <S%G2076><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> chasteneth <S%G3811><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye be <S%G2075><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> chastisement <S%G3809><s%>, whereof <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%>, then <S%G686><s%> are ye <S%G2075><s%> bastards <S%G3541><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%>.

Furthermore <S%G1534><s%> <S%G3303><s%> we have had <S%G2192><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> which corrected <S%G3810><s%> us, and <S%G2532><s%> we gave them reverence <S%G1788><s%>: shall we <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> unto the Father <S%G3962><s%> of spirits <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> live <S%G2198><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> they verily <S%G3303><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> chastened <S%G3811><s%> us after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G846><s%> pleasure <S%G1380><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he for <S%G1909><s%> our profit <S%G4851><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> we might be partakers <S%G3335><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> holiness <S%G41><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3756><s%> chastening <S%G3809><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3303><s%> the present <S%G3918><s%> seemeth <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> joyous <S%G5479><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> grievous <S%G3077><s%>: nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G5305><s%> it yieldeth <S%G591><s%> the peaceable <S%G1516><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto them which are exercised <S%G1128><s%> thereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> lift up <S%G461><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> which hang down <S%G3935><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the feeble <S%G3886><s%> knees <S%G1119><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> straight <S%G3717><s%> paths <S%G5163><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, lest that <S%G3363><s%> which is lame <S%G5560><s%> be turned out of the way <S%G1624><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> let it <S%G2390><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> be healed <S%G2390><s%>.

Follow <S%G1377><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, and <S%G2532><s%> holiness <S%G38><s%>, without <S%G5565><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

Looking diligently <S%G1983><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> fail <S%G5302><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; lest <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> root <S%G4491><s%> of bitterness <S%G4088><s%> springing <S%G5453><s%> up <S%G507><s%> trouble <S%G1776><s%> you, and <S%G2532><s%> thereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5026><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> be defiled <S%G3392><s%>;

Lest <S%G3361><s%> there be any <S%G5100><s%> fornicator <S%G4205><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> profane person <S%G952><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> Esau <S%G2269><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> for <S%G473><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> morsel of meat <S%G1035><s%> sold <S%G591><s%> his <S%G846><s%> birthright <S%G4415><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye know <S%G2467><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> that afterward <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3347><s%>, when he would <S%G2309><s%> have inherited <S%G2816><s%> the blessing <S%G2129><s%>, he was rejected <S%G593><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%>, though <S%G2539><s%> he sought <S%G1567><s%> it <S%G846><s%> carefully <S%G1567><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye are <S%G4334><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G4334><s%> unto the mount <S%G3735><s%> that might be touched <S%G5584><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that burned <S%G2545><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%>, nor <S%G2532><s%> unto blackness <S%G1105><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tempest <S%G2366><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> the sound <S%G2279><s%> of a trumpet <S%G4536><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of words <S%G4487><s%>; which <S%G3739><s%> voice they that heard <S%G191><s%> intreated <S%G3868><s%> that the word <S%G3056><s%> should <S%G4369><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be spoken <S%G4369><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> any more <S%G3361><s%>:

(For <S%G1063><s%> they could <S%G5342><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> endure <S%G5342><s%> that which was commanded <S%G1291><s%>, And if so much as <S%G2579><s%> a beast <S%G2342><s%> touch <S%G2345><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%>, it shall be stoned <S%G3036><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> thrust through <S%G2700><s%> with a dart <S%G1002><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> terrible <S%G5398><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the sight <S%G5324><s%>, that Moses <S%G3475><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, I exceedingly fear <S%G1630><s%> <S%G1510><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> quake <S%G1790><s%>:)

But <S%G235><s%> ye are come <S%G4334><s%> unto mount <S%G3735><s%> Sion <S%G4622><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto the city <S%G4172><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to an innumerable company <S%G3461><s%> of angels <S%G32><s%>,

To the general assembly <S%G3831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> of the firstborn <S%G4416><s%>, which are written <S%G583><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> the Judge <S%G2923><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to the spirits <S%G4151><s%> of just men <S%G1342><s%> made perfect <S%G5048><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the mediator <S%G3316><s%> of the new <S%G3501><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to the blood <S%G129><s%> of sprinkling <S%G4473><s%>, that speaketh <S%G2980><s%> better things <S%G2909><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> that of Abel <S%G6><s%>.

See <S%G991><s%> that ye refuse <S%G3868><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> him that speaketh <S%G2980><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> escaped <S%G5343><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> who refused him <S%G3868><s%> that spake <S%G5537><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall not we <S%G2249><s%> escape, if we turn away from him <S%G654><s%> that speaketh from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>:

Whose <S%G3739><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shook <S%G4531><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> he hath promised <S%G1861><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Yet <S%G2089><s%> once more <S%G530><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> shake <S%G4579><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this word, Yet <S%G2089><s%> once more <S%G530><s%>, signifieth <S%G1213><s%> the removing <S%G3331><s%> of those things that are shaken <S%G4531><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of things that are made <S%G4160><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> those things which cannot <S%G3361><s%> be shaken <S%G4531><s%> may remain <S%G3306><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> we receiving <S%G3880><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%> which cannot be moved <S%G761><s%>, let us have <S%G2192><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, whereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we may serve <S%G3000><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> acceptably <S%G2102><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> reverence <S%G127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> godly fear <S%G2124><s%>:
For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is a consuming <S%G2654><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.
